description: 12 disciples, wearing white garments, some with black and red stripes, eating watermelon; Jesus at center, wearing 3-lobed hat and holding a cup; central table with watermelon, bananas, and other foods
marks: \"GOGAIN\", in purple, LRC of front of table \"CONSTANTINO/FELIPE CANDELARIO/\"OCUMICHO MICH.\"\",
title: The Last Supper
